title: Seriously not liking Riot’s responses to everything.
body:
I’m here trying to be MAD but they’re all CALM and LOGICAL and NICE.

How do you expect me to complain when they EMPATHISE WITH US!?
{{sticker:darius-angry}} 

For real though, ty Riot :)

replies.body: Same tho tbh. <3
https://tctechcrunch2011.files.wordpress.com/2015/02/its-dangerous-to-go-alone-take-this.jpg
Good luck braving the boards, friend.
Ooh? Is there a new rioter here for the smites?
...well, I guess I have to go cause chaos then to make up for it, right? That's what I'm getting here. :P

Gee Brain, what are we going to do tonight?

The same thing we do every night, Pinky.
Try to take over the Boards!
How do you feel about the theory that Pinky is the actual genius and stops the insane Brain's plans?
Very compelling, but I doubt it would stand up to careful scrutiny of the source material.

Think about the theme/intro song. "One is a genius, the other insane." However, Pinky is shown more as an idiot as opposed to insane. 

Brain is also actively trying to take over the world, something we usually associate with insane villains. The reason all of Brain's plan fail though is because of Pinky's interference. Pinky is our unsung hero. Pinky simply plays the fool in order to make Brain feel non threatened. Doing such allows him to stay close to a mad mouse.
NAARRRRRF!

I'm sure glad Riot have mature people in charge who are not only receptive of critical feedback, but also take action on it. Some dev companies out there can't help but make smart-ass responses and largely ignore massive community protests and demands. But I don't have time to explain why I don't have time to explain.

RIOT REPLYING TO POSTS? 

REEEEEEEEEEEEEEE
Far as i've seen, a lot of the threads are constructively written feedback. I don't get your point.
The overwhelming majority of posts are just "reeeeeeeeeeeee"
Yeah but that's like everywhere. Things like that don't reach the front page that often.
you and I use very different boards then.
What problem?

None, I just like reading through the red posts.
It seems like they have unbreakable resolve.
